item.title: On the Optimal Control of Pollution in a Human Capital Growth Model
item.description: To capture the impact of pollution on economic growth, we compute the optimal policy in a continuous-time endogenous growth model à la Lucas (1988).

item.title: Croissance endogène et pollution: Une approche fondée sur le comportement du consommateur
item.description: This paper develops a continuous time model of endogenous growth based on innovations in consumption goods.
